data.name: Pathfinders: Mini Words
data.detailed_description:
Also recommended for you

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1294780/Pathfinders_Memories/?utm_source=steampage&utm_campaign=pfmw_page

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1576600/Matraquinha_PAIR/?utm_source=steampage&utm_campaign=pfmw_page

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1564560/Island_Farmer__Jigsaw_Puzzle/?utm_source=steampage&utm_campaign=pfmw_page


About the Game

The Pathfinders have just arrived on Earth. They want to be our friends and to communicate with us.
They captured images of common objects and animals, and want to know their names.

Let's help Pathfinders discover basic words in English, in this unique mix of logic puzzle and word search.

In each level:
  • Observe the images of day-by-day objects or animals;
  • Find their name on the board, using all letters on the board, without repeating or crossing paths.
  • Listen to the words spoken in English - using automated text-to-speech technology from AWS (Amazon Web Services).

The newest game in the Mini Words series presents simpler challenges compared to the other instances, so English learners of all levels can have fun while practicing vocabulary!

It offers 100 levels, in the English language only.

See the previous Mini Words games on our studio page:
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/menssana

data.short_description: Help Pathfinders discover the name of day-by-day objects in English. A unique mix of logic puzzle and word search. Great for English learners.
data.reviews:
‚ÄúPathfinders: Mini Words is an adorable little game with a lot of educational value. It‚Äôs cute, it‚Äôs fun, it‚Äôs easy to pick up and play. There is a lot going for this cute little game, and anyone with kids should pick this one up.‚Äù

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
